intro: On the fifth day of the same month, we commemorate our holy father Sabbas the Sanctified.
On the same day we commemorate the Holy Martyr Anastasios.
On the same day the Holy Martyr Diogenes, having been stoned, is perfected.
On the same day the Holy Martyr Aberkios is perfected by the sword.
On the same day Saint Nonnius is perfected in peace.
On the same day Saint Gratus is perfected in peace.
On the same day we commemorate our holy father Nektarios, who practiced asceticism in the cell of Iagari near Karyes on Mount Athos in the year 1470.
On the same day Saint Philotheos the Karyote, the spiritual father of the aforementioned Nektarios, who was also deemed worthy of the gift of foresight, is perfected in peace.

who: The Holy Venerable Martyrs of the Cells of Mount Athos
intro: On the same day the holy venerable martyrs who dwelt in the cells of Mount Athos and reproved the Latin-minded—namely the Emperor Michael and the Patriarch Bekkos—are perfected: the first by hanging, the rest by the sword.
